701884f-a.title: Bronx: Thieriot Avenue - Randall Avenue
701884f-a.text:
Thieriot Avenue, at the S. E. corner of Randall Avenue, showing Public School No. 69. The view is across Soundview Avenue; the plot of ground on which the white shanty is located separates Soundview
from Thieriot Avenues.
August 21, 1940
P. L. Sperr
701884f-a.folder: Thieriot Avenue & Randall Avenue, Bronx, NY
